questiontext.text: An entrance exam has scores that are approximately normally distributed with a mean of 500 and a standard deviation of 100. If you select randomly select 40 scores, what is the distribution of the mean of this sample?

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 20 and standard error of 2.5.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 20 and standard error of 2.5: Incorrect

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 250 and standard error of 50.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 250 and standard error of 50â€¦: Incorrect

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 500 and standard error of 2.5.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 500 and standard error of 2.5: Incorrect

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 500 and standard error of 15.8.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 500 and standard error of 15.8: Correct
